title: Albarello
medium: Ceramic; fritware, molded and painted in black and cobalt blue (rim) under a transparent turquoise glaze
inscribed:
In Arabic, "العز والبقاء والإقبال"

"Power [glory] and immortality and good fortune [prosperity]"

Read by Abdullah Ghouchani, translated by Caitlin McKenna
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Horace O. Havemeyer

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
